name: Fabricmc wiki darkmode
description: an unofficial darkmode for the wiki pages of fabricmc.net
additional_info:
Except for the External-Line Color and Alpha, all the settings are for text color

The External-Line Alpha goes from 00 to ff
(for example: 0f or e4)

If something is not modified by this userstyle, send a comment and I will see if I can do something about it.
